verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> you the Lord <S%H3050><s%>. Praise <S%H1984><s%>, O you servants <S%H5650><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, praise <S%H1984><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> from this time forth <S%H6258><s%> and for <S%H5704><s%> evermore <S%H5769><s%>.
From the rising <S%H4217><s%> of the sun <S%H8121><s%> unto the going down <S%H3996><s%> of the same the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s name <S%H8034><s%> is to be praised <S%H1984><s%>.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is high <S%H7311><s%> above all nations <S%H1471><s%>, and his glory <S%H3519><s%> above the heavens <S%H8064><s%>.
Who is like unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, who dwells <S%H3427><s%> on high <S%H1361><s%>,
Who humbles <S%H8213><s%> himself to behold <S%H7200><s%> the things that are in heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and in the earth <S%H776><s%>!
He raises up <S%H6965><s%> the poor <S%H1800><s%> out of the dust <S%H6083><s%>, and lifts <S%H7311><s%> the needy <S%H34><s%> out of the dunghill <S%H830><s%>;
That he may set <S%H3427><s%> him with princes <S%H5081><s%>, even with the princes <S%H5081><s%> of his people <S%H5971><s%>.

He makes the childless woman <S%H6135><s%> to keep <S%H3427><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, and to be a joyful <S%H8056><s%> mother <S%H517><s%> of sons <S%H1121><s%>. Praise <S%H1984><s%> you the Lord <S%H3050><s%>.
